title: Israel Says Its Troops Will Stay in Seized Territory for Now
content: Israel said its forces would remain in Syrian territory until “a new force” filled the vacuum. Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken was in Jordan and Turkey for talks, and a top Turkish official appeared in Damascus.
summary: Israel said its forces would remain in Syrian territory until “a new force” filled the vacuum. Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken was in Jordan and Turkey for talks, and a top Turkish official appeared in Damascus.

title: Chinese-Flagged Ship Suspected of Cutting Cables Remains Halted Weeks Later
